sys_script_include.name: FHCheckTableExistence

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_include_b73642c8831a321083e1b4a6feaad3f3
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_1310794_founda_0.FHCheckTableExistence</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><mobile_callable>false</mobile_callable><name>FHCheckTableExistence</name><sandbox_callable>false</sandbox_callable><script><![CDATA[var FHCheckTableExistence = Class.create();
FHCheckTableExistence.prototype = {
    execute: function(ctx) {
        var gr = new GlideRecord('sys_db_object');
        if (!gr.get('name', ctx.config.table_name)) {
            ctx.addIssue('TABLE_NOT_FOUND', 'Table does not exist', 'high');
        }
    },
    type: 'FHCheckTableExistence'
};
]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2026-01-02 23:08:57</sys_created_on><sys_id>b73642c8831a321083e1b4a6feaad3f3</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>FHCheckTableExistence</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Foundation Health Analyzer" source="x_1310794_founda_0">d852994c8312321083e1b4a6feaad3e6</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="Foundation Health Analyzer">d852994c8312321083e1b4a6feaad3e6</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_b73642c8831a321083e1b4a6feaad3f3</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2026-01-02 23:08:57</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
